title: Squashed commit of the following:
message:
Squashed commit of the following:

commit 456b093643c4bd1ae639a486dabaf23059a17ab5
Author: Chris Tarazi <tarazichris@gmail.com>
Date:   Sun May 28 12:08:42 2017 -0700

    Fix potential NPE in PriceDataFragment

title: Modify swipe-to-refresh container layout
message:
Modify swipe-to-refresh container layout

The container only holds the text elements above the chart so that it
does not interfere with the swipe functionality of the chart.

title: Add error message toast for JSON exception
message: Add error message toast for JSON exception

title: Fix NullPointerException crash when hiding keyboard
message: Fix NullPointerException crash when hiding keyboard

title: Improve PriceDataFragment layout
message:
Improve PriceDataFragment layout

Flatten and remove extraneous layouts. Padding has also changed for
better ratio.

title: Automatically change menu item title in ProfitFragment
message:
Automatically change menu item title in ProfitFragment

When the Buy field contains the current price, modify the menu item
to say "Remove...", and vice versa. Do the same for the Sell field.

title: Automatically change menu item title in BreakevenFragment
message:
Automatically change menu item title in BreakevenFragment

When the Buy field contains the current price, modify the menu item
to say "Remove...", and vice versa. Do the same for the Sell field.

title: Rewrite fee calculation code
message:
Rewrite fee calculation code

Remove seekbar because it was not really useful. The fee on the
transaction is now correctly computed. Before it was done after the
profit margins were calculated, which was a mistake. Moved and
refactored the fee percentage variable as a private instance variable.
Not sure why I declared it differently before.

title: Fix error where commas from price field break the calculation
message: Fix error where commas from price field break the calculation

title: Update app version
message:
Update app version

Removes redundant manifest version declaration since Gradle manages this
now.

message: Update gradle and support library versions
